# Interactive Graph
---
title: "Interactive Graph"
format: html
resources:
  - daily_arrest_data.json
---

<style>
  * {
    font-family: sans-serif;
  }
  #tooltip {
    position: absolute;
    text-align: left;
    padding: 8px;
    font-size: 12px;
    background: white;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    border-radius: 4px;
    pointer-events: none;
    display: none;
  }

  #buttons-container {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    margin-top: 20px;
  }

  .borough-button {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    border: 1px solid black;
    padding: 5px;
    margin: 2px;
    cursor: pointer;
    border-radius: 5px;
  }

  .borough-button.active {
    background-color: lightgray;
  }
  .borough-box {
    width: 15px;
    height: 15px;
    margin-right: 5px;
    border: 1px solid black;
  }
  
  .line {
    fill: none;
    stroke-width: 2px;
  }

   #slider-container {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    margin-top: 20px;
  }

  #date-slider {
    width: 80%;
  }
</style>

<div id="plot"></div>
<div id="tooltip"></div>
<div id="buttons-container"></div>
<div id="slider-container"></div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3-simple-slider"></script>
<script src="scripts/myscript.js"></script>
